00029 /* 
00030  * Helper class for reading hgr scene files. 
00031  * See maxexport and NS(Scene,Scene) for usage examples
00032  * and hgr-fileformat.txt for documentation.
00033  * @ingroup hgr
00034  */
00035 class SceneInputStream :
00036     public NS(io,DataInputStream)
00037 {
00038 public:
00040     enum DataFlags
00041     {
00043         DATA_MATERIALS      = 1,
00045         DATA_PRIMITIVES     = 2,
00047         DATA_NODES          = 4,
00049         DATA_ANIMATIONS     = 8,
00051         DATA_USERPROPERTIES = 16,
00052     };
00053 
00055     static const int MIN_VERSION;
00056 
00058     static const int MAX_VERSION;
00059 
00064     explicit SceneInputStream( NS(io,InputStream)* in );
00065 
00067     ~SceneInputStream();
00068 
00073     NS(math,float3)         readFloat3();
00074 
00079     NS(math,float4)         readFloat4();
00080 
00085     NS(math,quaternion)     readQuaternion();
00086 
00091     NS(math,float3x4)           readFloat3x4();
00092 
00097     P(TransformAnimation)   readTransformAnimation();
00098 
00103     P(KeyframeSequence)     readKeyframeSequence();
00104 
00109     P(TransformAnimation::Float3Anim) readFloat3Anim();
00110 
00115     void                    readFloat3Array16( NS(math,float3)* out, int count );
00116 
00121     void                    readFloat4Array16( NS(math,float4)* out, int count );
00122 
00128     P(UserPropertySet)      readUserPropertySet( Scene* scene=0 );
00129         
00135     void                    readVertexFormat( NS(gr,VertexFormat)* vf );
00136 
00142     P(NS(gr,Primitive))     readPrimitive( NS(gr,Context)* context, int* materialindex );
00143 
00150     void                    readNode( Node* node, int* parentindex );
00151 
00155     int                     version() const             {return m_ver;}
00156 
00161     int                     exporterVersion() const     {return m_exporterVer;}
00162 
00167     bool                    hasData( int flags ) const;
00168 
00172     NS(gr,Context)::PlatformType    platform() const;
00173 
00174 private:
00175     int                         m_ver;
00176     int                         m_exporterVer;
00177     int                         m_dataFlags;
00178     NS(gr,Context)::PlatformType    m_platformID;
00179 
00180     SceneInputStream( const SceneInputStream& );
00181     SceneInputStream& operator=( const SceneInputStream& );
00182 };
